mcq.statement: Which of the following correctly lists the layers of the Earth from the outermost to the innermost?

options.a: Crust, Upper Mantle, Lower Mantle, Outer Core, Inner Core
options.b: Crust, Lower Mantle, Upper Mantle, Inner Core, Outer Core
options.c: Inner Core, Outer Core, Lower Mantle, Upper Mantle, Crust

mcq.one_liner: The layers of the Earth, from the outermost to the innermost, are the **Crust, Upper Mantle, Lower Mantle, Outer Core, and Inner Core**.
